    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4799</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Peer Conferencing in the Classroom</string>
            <string language="es">Conferencia de alumnos en la clase</string>
            <string language="ga">Comhdháil Piara sa Seomra Ranga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleicherconferencing im Klassenzimmer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Communication de pair dans la salle de classe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conferencing do par na sala de aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comunicazione del pari nell'aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όμοια σύσκεψη στην τάξη</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Lesson where children are encouraged to respond to a piece of writing in a constructive manner.</string>
            <string language="es">Lección donde se anima a los niños a que respondan a una obra escrita de una forma constructiva.</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceacht ina spreagtar leanaí freagairt do phíosa scríbhneoireachta ar bhealach cuiditheach.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="es">plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion, in der Kinder angeregt werden, auf ein 
Stück des Schreibens in eine konstruktive Weise zu reagieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Leçon où des enfants sont encouragés à 
répondre à un morceau d'inscription d'une façon constructive.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lição onde as crianças são incentivadas 
responder a uma parte de escrita em uma maneira constructive.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lezione dove i bambini sono consigliati a 
rispondere ad una parte di scrittura in un modo costruttivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθημα όπου τα παιδιά ενθαρρύνονται για να αποκριθούν
σε ένα κομμάτι του γραψίματος κατά τρόπο εποικοδομητικό.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
